name: fur-refer

scripts.test:all: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report && npm run allure:generate && ts-node tests/utils/upload-playwright-report-to-s3.ts && ts-node tests/utils/always-json-reporter.ts
scripts.test:teams: npx playwright test && npx ts-node tests/utils/upload-playwright-report-to-s3.ts && npx ts-node tests/utils/send-teams-report.ts
scripts.test:teams:full: npm run test:teams && npx playwright show-report && ts-node tests/utils/upload-playwright-report-to-s3.ts
scripts.test:full: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report && ts-node tests/utils/upload-playwright-report-to-s3.ts && ts-node tests/utils/always-json-reporter.ts
scripts.test:ci: npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report && ts-node tests/utils/upload-playwright-report-to-s3.ts && ts-node tests/utils/send-teams-report.ts
scripts.test:allure: npx playwright test && npx allure serve allure-results

description: Automated Playwright tests for FUR4.com and refer.fur4.com guest-facing areas
